@ChannelNewsAsia @tvidjka From Asia's World City

Thanks CCP!
@ChannelNewsAsia @Silence21240183 so called leader create all the panic

@ChannelNewsAsia The mandatory testing n lockdown r pointless! U only find out many asymptomatic ppl n distort ppl lives. Y dun focus the resources to those who need medical attention? #HongKong's COVID policy has nth to do w/ science. HK govt just wanna control ppl's lives n please Xi Jinping.
